snippet: To promote the documentary “Girl Rising,” the makers will rely on techniques often used by more traditional advertisers, including personalized ads for employees of companies viewing it online.
abstract: Tanzina Vega Advertising column describes innovative campaign for documentary Girl Rising that will target employees at 57 companies in hopes that they will support efforts to educate girls in developing countries.
lead_paragraph: To promote the documentary “Girl Rising,” the makers will rely on techniques often used by more traditional advertisers, including personalized ads for employees of companies viewing it online.

headline.seo: Finding a Documentary Audience, for a Cause
